title: Primary and Secondary roles
body: Why does it feel like whenever i pick something as my main role it doesn't matter, since riot will just give me my secondary which i only have selected because I'm forced to? I feel like there should be an option to opt to be in queue longer to guarantee the role you want rather than have to wait hours to play a champ. In this case i wanted to play Lux mid, and had Bot as my second role,  and twice in a row i got bot instead of mid, and i don't want to ask to switch because i don't want to feed and make it awkward. What is everyone else's thoughts on this matter? Should we have to be content with a role we really don't want, or should be allowed to opt to have only one role if we choose, at the cost of higher queue times?

replies.body: As a main support, I have no idea what you are talking about..  :P {{champion:497}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:12}}
But joke aside, yes i agree with you.

Personally, I think this could actually be a fairly good idea. Too many times have I heard "well I got support and didn't want it, guess Imma feed/int/afk". With so many people intentionally ruining games, and so many people willing to wait longer queue times for a match for their preferred role, I could definitely get on board with this. 

I can't really make this change myself, but you could get the community together to see how everyone feels by posting this over in Client Discussion!
